Patent Information.Patent Title: Stapled Intracellular-targeting Antimicrobial Peptides To Treat Infection
Patent Information.Abstract: Structurally stabilized, e.g., stapled, peptides with the ability to translocate through microbial cell membranes to the interior of microbial cells and exert a biological activity there are provided, as are methods of designing, making and using such peptides.

Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the histone H2A family
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Hipposin, a histone-derived antimicrobial peptide in Atlantic halibut (Hippoglossus hippoglossus L.).
Literature.Author: Birkemo GA, Luders T, Andersen O, Nes IF, Nissen-Meyer J
